sentences.sentence: Any thought of splitting up the company was unthinkable, they said.
sentences.translation: 他们说，任何分裂该公司的想法都是不可思议的。

sentences.sentence: To be exact — my husband's doctor uttered an unthinkable word: leukaemia.
sentences.translation: 确切地说，我丈夫的医生说了一个不可思议的词：白血病。

sentences.sentence: Five years ago the making of such a programme would have been unthinkable.
sentences.translation: 五年前，制作这种电视节目是难以想象的。
